channel.title: [508] bulby, keeps saying requirement is 10 slayer for all slayer npcs, but look

item.title: [508] bulby, keeps saying requirement is 10 slayer for all slayer npcs, but look
item.dc:creator: @sponge_bong sponge bong
item.description:
@sponge_bong wrote:

ok this is my code.

if (n.npcType == 1648 && n.isDead) { p.addSkillXP(500, 18); } if (p.skillLvl[18] < 10) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 10 Slayer to slay this monster."); return; } if (n.npcType == 1612 && n.isDead) { p.addSkillXP(1000, 18); } if (p.skillLvl[18] < 30) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 30 Slayer to slay this monster."); return; } if (n.npcType == 1643 && n.isDead) { p.addSkillXP(2000, 18); } if (p.skillLvl[18] < 40) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 40 Slayer to slay this monster."); return; } if (n.npcType == 1618 && n.isDead) { p.addSkillXP(2500, 18); } if (p.skillLvl[18] < 50) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 50 Slayer to slay this monster."); return; } if (n.npcType == 1604 && n.isDead) { p.addSkillXP(5000, 18); } if (p.skillLvl[18] < 75) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 75 Slayer to slay this monster."); return; } if (n.npcType == 1610 && n.isDead) { p.addSkillXP(7500, 18); } if (p.skillLvl[18] < 80) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 80 Slayer to slay this monster."); return; } if (n.npcType == 1613 && n.isDead) { p.addSkillXP(8500, 18); } if (p.skillLvl[18] < 85) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 85 Slayer to slay this monster."); return; } if (n.npcType == 1615 && n.isDead) { p.addSkillXP(10000, 18); }
but instead of saying the level slayer needed for each monster, when i attack each monster it says i only need 10 slayer for it. any idea why? it could be cause the first slayer monster has it, but how do i make it have requirements for all npcs?

Read full topic
